title: Lizzie's library: Possums don't wear boots
creator_credit: Phillip Bowman, Henderson Bowman Productions, ABC-TV (Australia), Film Queensland, Australian Film Commission and Tim Adlide
brief_description: Lizzie’s Library is a delightful and informative series for young children set in the little Australian riverside town of Long Flat. Lizzie the librarian is back in this second video with her loveable dog BJ, her Murri co-worker Munro and her mobile library Booksy. Join Lizzie and her friends in nine more lively adventures. Narration and voice characterisation by Noni Hazelhurst.
